data.eml:eml: Two new genera of fossil palaeontinids from the Middle Jurassic in Daohugou, Inner Mongolia, China (Hemiptera, Palaeontinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ying, Wang, Dong, Ren (2007): Two new genera of fossil palaeontinids from the Middle Jurassic in Daohugou, Inner Mongolia, China (Hemiptera, Palaeontinidae). Zootaxa 1390: 41-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175235
